thread.title: Rusted water heater blamed in Iowa family deaths at Mexican resort

title: Rusted water heater blamed in Iowa family deaths at Mexican resort
text:
Rusted water heater blamed in Iowa family deaths at Mexican resort 6:54pm IST - 00:47 
Mexican authorities say a faulty water heater blamed for the death of an Iowa family vacationing in Mexico had rusted in the humid Carribean weather. Linda So reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Mexican authorities say a faulty water heater blamed for the death of an Iowa family vacationing in Mexico had rusted in the humid Carribean weather. Linda So reports. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2q8dQU9
